text:
These cookies are used to collect information about how you interact with our website and allow us to remember you.
We may also release information when its release is appropriate to comply with the law, enforce our site policies, or protect our or others' rights, property, or safety.
We need your information to deliver our services.
We use this information in order to improve and customize your browsing experience and for analytics and metrics about our visitors both on this website and other media.
We use this information to personalize your experience with our products and to deliver the type of content and product offerings that you are most interested in.
What kind of data we collect, for what purposes we may use the data, how data is protected and what are your rights over your personal data collected by Tutor Platform.
What types of information we collect

For instance, we use cookies to help us compile aggregate data about site traffic and site interaction so that we can offer better site experiences and tools in the future.
This website stores cookies on your computer.
We collect only the information you voluntarily provided to us.

data_type: information you provide we on website
text: We collect the information you voluntarily provide us on our website and web or mobile applications or we automatically collect this information from social media platforms when you interact with us.
When interacting with our website we may also automatically collect information about you such as what device you use, your IP address, or the operation system you use.
However, non-personally identifiable visitor information may be provided to other parties for marketing, advertising, or other uses.
